question: Input JSON: {"data": {"data_types": ["clinical", "survey"], "human_participants": {"involves_humans": true}}, "project": {"title": "ICU Outcomes Study"}}  What is the appropriate data classification?

Input JSON: {"data": {"data_types": ["employee_records"], "fields": ["name", "salary", "performance_review"], "human_participants": {"involves_humans": true}}, "project": {"title": "HR Annual Reviews"}}  What is the appropriate data classification?

Input JSON: {"data": {"data_types": ["press_release"], "human_participants": {"involves_humans": false}}, "project": {"title": "Annual Research Highlights"}}  What is the appropriate data classification?

Input JSON: {"data": {"data_types": ["de-identified health information"], "human_participants": {"involves_humans": true}}, "project": {"title": "ICU Outcomes Study"}}  What is the appropriate data classification?

Input JSON: {"data": {"data_types": ["research_health"], "fields": ["diagnosis", "treatment"], "human_participants": {"involves_humans": true}, "identifiability": "identifiable"}, "project": {"title": "ICU Outcomes Study"}}  What is the appropriate data classification?

Input JSON: {"data": {"data_types": ["login_credentials"], "fields": ["username", "password"], "human_participants": {"involves_humans": false}}, "project": {"title": "System Access Data"}}  What is the appropriate data classification?
A research dataset is initially classified as Confidential. If it is updated to include Social Security Numbers, what should its classification be?
If a dataset is expanded to include biometric data used for authentication (e.g., fingerprint scans), how should its classification be updated?
A report was initially marked Confidential. After it is officially published on the public website, what does its classification become?
A list of scholarship applicants' personal contact information will only be used internally within the organisation. Should this information be classified as Internal or Confidential?
If a dataset is under a contractual confidentiality agreement but also contains data that laws require to be treated with the highest level of protection, which classification should apply?
